form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, FORM OF-230 PART I

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 OMB APPROVAL NO 1405 0015 EXPIRES 9-30-95 ESTIMATED BURDEN 1 HOUR APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION PART I - BIOGRAPHIC DATA INSTRUCTIONS: Complete one copy of this form for yourself and each member of your family, regardless of age, who will immigrate with you. Please print or type your answer to all questions. Questions that are Not Applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on a separate sheet using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheet to this form. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. This form (OF-230 PART I) is Part I of two parts which, together with Optional Form OF-230 PART II, constitute the complete Application for Immigrant Visa and Alien Registration. 1. FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME SWARUP MAHESH NMN 2. OTHER NAMES USED OR BY WHICH KNOWN (If married woman, give maiden name) MAHESH SWARUP SAXENA 3. FULL NAME IN NATIVE ALPHABET (If Roman letters not used) HORT topay 4. DATE OF BIRTH 5. AGE 6. PLACE OF BIRTH (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 06 03 1907 88 YEARS BADAUN U.P. INDIA 7. NATIONALITY (If dual national, 8. SEX 9. MARITAL STATUS give both) Male Single (Never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated INDIAN Female Including my present marriage, I have been married ONE times. 10. PERSONAL DESCRIPTION 11. OCCUPATION a. Color of hair GREY C. Height 170 cms WHEATISH RETIRED b. Color of eyes BLACK d. Complexion BROWN 12. MARKS OF IDENTIFICATION 13. PRESENT ADDRESS 1) MOLE ON RIGHT SIDE OF NOSE 2) SCAR MARK ON UPPER LIP. FOIA (b)(6) 14. NAME OF SPOUSE (Maiden or family name) (First name) (Middle name) VERMA OMWATI DEVI ( DECEASED) Date and place of birth of spouse: SEPT. 11, 1911; BAREILLY (UP) INDIA - DECEASED Address of spouse (If different from your own): DECEASED 15. LIST NAME, DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH AND ADDRESSES OF ALL CHILDREN NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH ADDRESS (If different from your own) SHANNO RANI SAKSENA OCT 8, 1934: AGRA(UP) INDIA -80 ANSARINAGAR, ATTMS, N. DELHI-29 DHARMENDRA -SWARUP JULY 10, 1937; BAREILLY (UP) INDIA 17101LABURNUM CT, ROCKVILLE MD 20855USA SAROJ VERMA OCT. 1, 1939; AGRA (UP) INDIA A-436, BDA COLONY, SHAHPURA, BHOPAL-16 DHIRENDRA SWARUP SAXENA JUNE 11, 1940; AGRA (UP) INDIA 1068, SUGARTREE DRIVE SOUTH TAKET FOIA (b)(6) THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA OPTIONAL FORM 230 Part I (ENGLISH) NSN 7540-00-130-8317 REVISED 4-91 50230(1)-1 Previous editions obsolete DEPT. OF STATE
